data.comment: In the minute -1, 9300 spectators are watching the match in Dortmund.
Today's referee, Felix Brych, has blown to start the match.
M´gladbach are whistled for offside.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Dortmund in their own half.
Free kick Dortmund.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Dortmund.
Ball goes out of play for a Dortmund goal kick.
In the minute 7, M´gladbach have a goal kick.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Dortmund territory.
In Dortmund a free kick has been awarded the away team.
M´gladbach are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 14, Manuel Akanji for Dortmund has been booked by Felix Brych and receives a first yellow card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Thorgan Hazard.
In the minute 17, Felix Brych awards Dortmund a goal kick.
Felix Passlack (Dortmund) has replaced the possibly injured Thorgan Hazard at Signal Iduna Park.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Dortmund.
In the minute 21, Erling Haaland (Dortmund) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
Important block from the M´gladbach defence as Erling Haaland fires in a strike for Dortmund.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Dortmund.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Signal Iduna Park.
Can Dortmund capitalize from this throw-in deep inside M´gladbach's half?
Felix Brych signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for M´gladbach!
In the minute 30, Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Dortmund.
Felix Brych signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Dortmund's half.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
Free kick Dortmund.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
In the minute 35, Giovanni Reyna puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Jadon Sancho.
Felix Brych signals a Dortmund throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
In the minute 37, Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 39, Lars Stindl (M´gladbach) has received a yellow card from Felix Brych.
Throw-in for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
Jadon Sancho (Dortmund) powers in a header – against the bar!
In the minute 41, It's a goal kick for the away team in Dortmund.
Stefan Lainer of M´gladbach smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
In the minute 43, It's a goal kick for the away team in Dortmund.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Signal Iduna Park.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
In the minute 48, Felix Brych awards the home team a throw-in.
Felix Brych awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
M´gladbach push upfield but Felix Brych quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 53, Dortmund have been given a penalty at Signal Iduna Park...
Goal! Erling Haaland extends Dortmund's lead from the spot. They now lead 2-0.
Throw-in for Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 57, The away team have replaced Hannes Wolf with Marcus Thuram. This is the first substitution made today by Marco Rose.
The away team replace Lars Stindl with Alassane Plea.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dortmund make their second substitution with Thomas Delaney replacing Jude Bellingham.
In the minute 70, Marco Rose is making the team's third substitution at Signal Iduna Park with Patrick Herrmann replacing Oscar Wendt.
Throw-in for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
Ball goes out of play for a Dortmund goal kick.
In the minute 75, Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Goal! Dortmund extend their lead to 3-0 through Erling Haaland.
In the minute 78, Jadon Sancho instrumental with a fine assist.
Marco Reus is replacing Jadon Sancho for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
Julian Brandt is replacing Giovanni Reyna for the home team.
In the minute 81, Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Dortmund.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
M´gladbach have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Jonas Hofmann of M´gladbach gets in a strike, but is off target.
Dortmund have a goal kick.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Dortmund.
In the minute 86, M´gladbach push forward at Signal Iduna Park and Florian Neuhaus gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dortmund defence.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Dortmund territory.
In the minute 89, Throw-in high up the field for Dortmund in Dortmund.
Full-time! The final score is 3-0.
